name: Fur Flurry
description:
Take to the snow and see how many points you can get without wiping out!

Use the arrow keys to flip/ adjust the angle on your board as well as jump and do tricks to earn points.
Avoid the obstacles and collect coins.
Each time you complete a stage, the game gets harder and more obstacles are added.

There is an avalanche you must escape, this too gets faster with every stage completed.

You can unlock new boards and boarders with the bucks you earn too!

Donations for this game are much appreciated!
